title: How harmful are free softwares for a computer? - Quora

response.answer_text: The software which are available on the vendor’s site and are available for free to download are usually not harmful because they are provided by genuine party. Be aware to download the software or any file which is from untrusted source or which is available to you through ad service. These are generally harmful, attacker might bind some malicious code which can be used to gain access to your system. These are generally carried out by luring the user into drive by download attacks.

Its not the free software which are harmful , its the Trojan(virus) which comes along with it , and it would be very harmful for you & the device you're using , since it can leak your personal data such as credit card number your passwords your search activities & much more #Note :- Am talking about pirated softwares & Untrusted Software vendors/source s
